授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to improve your listening and writing ability of English through watching a movie-based material.  Students will also get a better understanding of cultural and social backgrounds on it.
到達目標: Students will be able to understand and improve English grammar and usages by listening to the movie's characters' everyday conversations.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
